name: sdks/ccxt/public/Markets loader

f838d7e5-74b5-4245-8630-aa75ce419cb1.name: exchange
f838d7e5-74b5-4245-8630-aa75ce419cb1.description:
Received the exchange to be load.

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/exchange-markets.html

Example:
```
{"id": "aax"}
```

1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.type:
{
    "id": string,
    "symbol": string,
    "base": string,
    "quote": string,
    "baseId": string,
    "quoteId": string,
    "active": boolean,
    "type": string,
    "spot": boolean,
    "margin": boolean,
    "future": boolean,
    "swap": boolean,
    "option": boolean,
    "contract": boolean,
    "settle": string,
    optional "settleId": string,
    "contractSize": number,
    "linear": boolean,
    "inverse": boolean,
    "expiry":  number, 
    "expiryDatetime": string,
    "strike": number,
    "optionType": ("call" or "put"),
    "taker": number,
    "maker": number,
    "percentage": boolean,
    "tierBased": boolean,
    "feeSide": ("get" or "give" or "base" or "quote" or "other"),
    "precision": {          
        "price": number,
        optional "amount": number,
        optional "cost": number
    },
    "limits": {
        "amount": {
            "min": number,
            "max": number
        },
        "price": any,
        "cost":  any,
        "leverage": any
    },
    "info": any
}
1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.name: data
1b5bfbab-7759-4f93-8905-5d7d5c0c48a6.description:
List of markets and trading symbols for a particular exchange 

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/manual.html#market-structure

description:
Loads the list of markets and trading symbols for a particular exchange.

More:
https://docs.ccxt.com/en/latest/manual.html#loading-markets

Example:
```
1. {"id": "aax"}@0 received via `exchange`
2. {
  "BTS/BTC": {
    "id": "BTC_BTS",
    "symbol": "BTS/BTC",
    "base": "BTS",
    "quote": "BTC",
    "baseId": "BTS",
    "quoteId": "BTC",
    "active": true,
    "type": "spot",
    "spot": true,
    "swap": false,
    "future": false,
    "option": false,
    "margin": false,
    "contract": false,
    "precision": {
      "amount": 1e-8,
      "price": 1e-8
    },
    "limits": {
      "amount": {
        "min": 0.000001
      },
      "price": {
        "min": 1e-8
      },
      "cost": {
        "min": 0.0001
      },
      "leverage": {}
    },
    "info": {
      "id": "14",
      "last": "0.00000048",
      "lowestAsk": "0.00000050",
      "highestBid": "0.00000047",
      "percentChange": "-0.04000000",
      "baseVolume": "0.00836150",
      "quoteVolume": "17241.72065796",
      "isFrozen": "0",
      "postOnly": "0",
      "marginTradingEnabled": "0",
      "high24hr": "0.00000050",
      "low24hr": "0.00000048"
    },
    "taker": 0.0009,
...}@0 sent via `data`
    "maker": 0.0009,
    "feeSide": "get",
    "numericId": 14
  }@0 sent via `data` 
  ```
